abstract.title: Overview
abstract.para: The common runtime components provide GT5 services with a set of libraries and tools that allows these services to be platform independent, to build on various abstraction layers (threading, io) and to leverage functionality lower in the web services stack (WSRF, WSN, etc).
The components included in this category are the WS Core (Java, C and Python), C Common Libraries and XIO (extensible I/O). and pyglobus
